courses.description: This course provides an update on the structure, functions, strengths, and development of primary healthcare, which has been evolving over time.
courses.enrollment_requirement: For students in Master of Public Health
courses.learning_outcomes: Understand the definition, scope, and functions of primary healthcare in Hong Kong as compared to other primary healthcare systems in other countries. Appreciate a wide range of strategies to improve lifestyle habits of the general population. Contextualize stakeholders and tools used in primary healthcare. Comprehend common Public-Private Partnership (PPP) programmes in Hong Kong. Appreciate a wide range of strategies that may be employed to enhance quality of care and address current challenges in primary healthcare.
